subject: RE: [junit] Experiencing problems with running the GUIs of TestRunner on Linux
msgSnippet: ... Please see the JUnit FAQ: http://junit.sourceforge.net/doc/faq/faq.htm Section 6 on Running Tests Scott Stirling
messageBody:
> -----Original Message-----
> From: chaz <cchoy@...> [mailto:cchoy@...]
>
> Hi,
> I'm experiencing a linkage problem when I try to run either the awt
> or the swing verion of TestRunner on Linux. Does anybody have the
> same problems? I am able to run the text version with no problems.

Please see the JUnit FAQ: http://junit.sourceforge.net/doc/faq/faq.htm

Section 6 on "Running Tests"

Scott Stirling
